description: SUPPORT TO SECURITY COORDINATION AND ENHANCING EARLY WARNING SYSTEMS TO CONSOLIDATE PEACE, SECURITY AND SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT IN SIERRA LEONE

subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
1. Enhanced logistic and operational capability of the ONS through equipping the organisation with an essential infrastructure
2. Establishment of an early warning system of threats to national security throughout the country by establishing the Chiefdom Security Committee (CHISEC) and communication system between Chiefdom and Freetwon.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: PBF Support  to ONS

title: PBF- Support to Office of National Security (ONS)
